code: import React from'react';import{Moon,Sun}from'lucide-react';import{useTheme}from'../contexts/ThemeContext';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ThemeToggle=()=>{const{theme,toggleTheme}=useTheme();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleTheme,className:"p-2 rounded-lg bg-gray-200 dark:bg-gray-700 hover:bg-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-gray-600 transition-colors duration-200","aria-label":"Alternar para tema ".concat(theme==='light'?'escuro':'claro'),children:theme==='light'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Moon,{className:"h-5 w-5 text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Sun,{className:"h-5 w-5 text-yellow-500"})});};export default ThemeToggle;
